name: Tomato Pasta
steps: Boil pasta for 10 minutes and drain it.
Heat olive oil in a pan and add chopped garlic.
Add crushed tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Mix pasta with the sauce and add salt to taste.
Serve hot with grated cheese.

name: Egg Sandwich
steps: Toast the bread slices with butter.
Fry the egg with salt and pepper.
Place the fried egg between two bread slices.
Cut in half and serve warm.

name: Veg Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice and let it cool.
Chop all vegetables finely.
Stir-fry veggies in a pan with soy sauce and salt.
Add rice and mix well.
Serve hot with ketchup.

name: Masala Tea
steps: Boil water and add crushed ginger and cardamom.
Add tea leaves and boil for 2 minutes.
Pour milk and sugar, simmer for another 2 minutes.
Strain into cups and serve hot.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Saute onions and tomatoes in butter until soft.
Grind them into a paste and cook with spices.
Add paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Top with cream and serve with naan.

name: Chocolate Mug Cake
steps: Mix all ingredients in a microwave-safe mug.
Microwave for 90 seconds.
Let it cool slightly and enjoy.

name: Lemon Rice
steps: Cook rice and let it cool.
Heat oil and add mustard seeds and turmeric.
Add cooked rice, lemon juice, and salt.
Mix well and serve.

name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Boil and mash potatoes with spices.
Make dough from flour and water.
Stuff potato filling into dough balls and roll out.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden brown.
